HomepageView.makeApplicationExplanation: Have credits earned at other universities credited for modules at Leipzig University. This is useful, for example, if you are transferring from another university to Leipzig University, returning after a semester abroad, or taking courses concurrently at another university.
HomepageView.viewStatusExplanation: Here you can view the status of your already submitted application. Enter the 6-digit process number provided to you when you submitted the application. Alternatively, you can also find this process number in the overview of your application as a PDF.

sideInfo.goToStudy: Once the application is completed, go to the study office with all relevant documents

HomepageView.ApplicationCode: process Number of the Application to be Accessed
HomepageView.ProcessNumberOfApplication: process Number of the Application to be Accessed

ApplicationInfoBox.Explanation: Select the course for which you want to have credits credited. Then enter the details of the credits. You can add as many module assignments as you like.
ApplicationInfoBox.ForeignModule: Credits earned at other universities that should be credited as modules of Leipzig University.
ApplicationInfoBox.belongingModules: Only specifically related modules should be written in a module assignment.
ApplicationInfoBox.multipleAssignments: You can add multiple module assignments for the entire application.
ApplicationInfoBox.exactModule: Specify one or more module(s) completed at another university.
ApplicationInfoBox.FillFields: The given fields must be filled out for this.
ApplicationInfoBox.CreditSystem: Specify the credit system (ECTS or other).
ApplicationInfoBox.uploadPDF: A PDF file with the official description of each module must be uploaded as a module description.
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseModule: Select one or more module(s) for which you want to have your credits credited.
ApplicationInfoBox.ChoseNone: If you cannot find a suitable module, you also have the option not to select any.
ApplicationInfoBox.FurtherInformation: Additional information about this module assignment can be provided here, this is optional.
ApplicationInfoBox.ModuleDescription: Module Description: PDF file with the description of the module Automata and Computability

StatusDetailView.FormalMistakeExplanation: Your application was rejected due to formal errors. The module assignments containing formal errors are marked in red. In the module assignment, you will find an explanation of the specific error at the bottom. Please correct all indicated errors. Then you can resubmit your application.
StatusDetailView.FinalDecisionExplanation: A final decision has been made on your application. This is only information about the possibility of recognition. To officially have your credits recognized, you must go to the study office. Please bring all relevant documents that prove the completion of the credits to be recognized. If you have further questions about your application, please contact the study office.

SideInfoStudyOffice.fmi: Faculty of Mathematics and Computer Science
SideInfoStudyOffice.ActualOfficeHours: Tuesday and Thursday: 9:00 am - 11:30 am and 12:30 pm - 4:00 pm

StatusPanel.NotYetDecided: No decision has been made yet

PanelExternalModulesItem.PointsNum: Points must be specified as a number

PanelInternalModules.NoModulesSelected: No modules of Leipzig University are selected.

ApplicationConfirmationView.NoteCode: Note down the process number. This is necessary to later view the status of your application.

LoginView.InvalidData: Invalid login data. Please try again

ErrorViewIndexjs.SomethingWentWrongContent: There was an unhandled error. Please try again. If the error persists, please contact the administrators.
ErrorViewIndexjs.NoAccesContent: Permission is missing to display this page.
ErrorViewIndexjs.SiteNotFoundContent: The requested page does not exist.
ErrorViewIndexjs.ServerUnreachableContent: The server is currently unreachable. Please try again later.
